text: @oliverdarcy @MarySiverson @PaulaReidCBS Does he think only Black folk are dying? Poor people, poor whites are dying. And COVID-19 is a painful, suffocating death. Hitler liked the healthy, “ideal physical specimens,” also. Are the people in this administration saying old, infirmed people are expendable? Grandparents?
